name: Dante's Trial
description:
Dante’s Trial 

Dante’s Trial is a local multiplayer minigame mix style game where the player dies and gets sent to Dante’s version of hell (Dante’s Inferno from Divine Comedy) and has to go through different punishments in the form of minigames to get out of hell.

(Note)

Our game is a local multiplayer game, so we planned to need the use of PARSEC in order to play in Semester Online Playtest.

Download the game and have fun :D

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
